I don't have this problem with the version 3.0M5 from 21.11.2003.

It seems it is failing due to an invalid JAR file. Please download again (a
newer build, such as 3.0 RC1, is better).

Please reopen if the problem happens again with a new download. You may want to
check the downloaded file against the MD5 signature, to make sure the file is ok.

BTW, you cannot rename the "eclipse" directory to something else. If you want to
keep multiple installs at the same time, a common practice is to have:

.../3.0M5/eclipse/...
.../3.0M8/eclipse/...
.../3.0RC1/eclipse/...

traces.message: jzentry == 0,  jzfile = 48451768,  total = 195,  name = c:\eclipse_300_8M\plugins\org.apache.lucene_1.3.0\lucene-1.3-final.jar,  i = 1,  message = invalid LOC header (bad signature)
